name: Build ChameleonUltra Firmware DFU

on:
  push:
    branches: [ lf-viking-support ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - run: |
          sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y gcc-arm-none-eabi cmake make libusb-1.0-0-dev
          mkdir build && cd build
          cmake .. && make
      - uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: Firmware .ultra APP DFU Package
          path: build/app_chameleon_ultra*.dfu
